text:
Mr. Robert Schenkkan, Pago 2, April 2h, 1959
P. S. I*m not sure how much money, if any, you* re counting on to help with
the Regional Meeting. The Board itself will have to decide this at
Columbus, since there are no funds for this In our Kellogg budget* Until
the Board authorizes funds for this, out of reserve, I have nothing to offer.
